definition: the Communist Youth League, abbr. for 共產主義青年團|共产主义青年团[Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2]
common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: Two thirds of the students in our class are League members.
sentences.chinese: 我們班上三分之二的學生是共青團員。

sentences.english: Being a League member, he is always helping others.
sentences.chinese: 因爲是共青團員，她常常輔助別人。

sentences.english: Eg: Inspired by her example, the League members worked even harder.
sentences.chinese: 在她榜樣的鼓舞下，共青團員們幹得更起勁了。

sentences.english: Three fourths of the students are League members.
sentences.chinese: 四分之三的學生是共青團員。

sentences.english: He is a League member and one of the best students in my class.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個共青團員和最好的一個學生在我的類。

sentences.english: As they were inspired by her example, the League members worked even harder.
sentences.chinese: 在她的榜樣的鼓舞下，共青團員們幹得更起勁了。

sentences.english: They should exercise leadership over trade unions, the Communist Youth League and other mass organizations, rally the workers around them.
sentences.chinese: 領導工會和共青團等羣衆組織，團結凝聚職工羣衆。

sentences.english: It is necessary for all the CYL members to observe the league rules.
sentences.chinese: 遵守團紀是共青團員必須做到的。

sentences.english: As you are a League member, you should be strict with yourself.
sentences.chinese: 因爲你是個共青團員，你就應該嚴格要求自己。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter will sum up the practice of the construction of the Communist Youth League under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.
sentences.chinese: 第五章對新時期黨領導共青團建設的實踐進行總結。

sentences.english: Some students, including all Young League members, are sweeping the streets.
sentences.chinese: 一些學生，包括全體共青團員，正在掃大街。

sentences.english: I am eager to join the Youth League.
Because you are a League member, you should help others.
sentences.chinese: 由於你是一個共青團員，所以你應該協助他人。

sentences.english: I have made up my mind to catch up with him and to join the League in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 我已下定決心要趕上他，在不久的將來加入共青團員。

sentences.english: None of the students in our class are League members.
sentences.chinese: 我們班沒有一個學生是共青團員。

sentences.english: The recent publications in Komsomolskaya Pravda has come in handy.
sentences.chinese: 最近的出版物在共青團真理報已經派上用場。

political commissar (during Russian and Chinese communist revolutions)

Shaoguan prefecture level city in Guangdong province
